## LogsInitConfiguration.forwardReports property

Forward reports from the \<a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Reporting\_API">Reporting API\</a> to Datadog. Use "all" to forward everything or an array of report types to forward only a subset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
forwardReports?: RawReportType[] | 'all' | undefined;
```
